name: Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore
quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.

name: Dudley Dursley
quote: I don't think you're a waste of space.

name: Harry James Potter
quote: There’s no need to call me sir, Professor.

name: Hermione Jean Granger
quote: I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed — or worse, expelled.

name: Molly Weasley
quote: Not my daughter, you b*tch!

name: Nearly Headless Nick
quote: Once again, you show all the sensitivity of a blunt axe.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
quote: Yer a wizard Harry.

name: Severus Snape
quote: You dare use my own spells against me, Potter?

name: Neville Longbottom
quote: I'm Quite Proud To Be Their Son.

name: Draco Malfoy
quote: My Father Will Hear About This.

name: Ronald Bilius Weasley
quote: Don’t let the Muggles get you down.

name: Luna Lovegood
quote: Don't worry. You're just as sane as I am.

name: Sirius Black
quote: I want to commit the murder I was imprisoned for.

name: Cornelius Fudge
quote: Keep everybody in their seats, a boy has just been killed.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
quote: Fame is a fickle friend, Harry. Celebrity is as celebrity does. Remember that.

name: Minerva McGonagall
quote: I’ve always wanted to use that spell.

name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
quote: You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts...but you cannot deny he's got style...

name: Poppy Pomfrey
quote: Thoughts could leave deeper scars than almost anything else.

name: Lord Voldemort
quote: Your devotion is nothing more than cowardice. You would not be here if you had anywhere else to go.

name: Alastor Moody
quote: Don't put your wand there, boy! What if it ignited? Better wizards than you have lost buttocks, you know.

name: Argus Filch
quote: Well, take a good look lads. This night might well be the last you spend in this castle. Oh, dear, we are in trouble

name: Arthur Weasley
quote: What is the exact function of a rubber duck?

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
quote: Neville Longbottom, Is It? How's Mum and Dad?

name: Dobby
quote: Terrible Things Are About To Happen At Hogwarts. Harry Potter Must Not Stay Here, Now That History Is To Repeat Itself.

name: Dolores Jane Umbridge
quote: You have been told that a certain Dark Wizard is at large once again. This is a lie.

name: Moaning Myrtle
quote: Here I am, minding my own business, and someone thinks it's funny to throw a book at me.
